title: Student Broadcasting-Based Experiential Learning of Indonesian History and Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Strengthening job-linked cultural understanding education for working professionals

learning_goals: Students can produce a 3-minute video report on major historical events and cultural characteristics of Indonesia.
Learners can complete content by applying teamwork and effective communication skills during the broadcast production process.
Participants can create experiential learning outputs using digital tools (camcorders, editing software).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
